definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: When she came back, she did her summer exercise first.
sentences.chinese: 当她回到家中之后，她首先做了暑假作业。

sentences.english: Even so, some teachers still gave us homework.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，有些老师还是布置了寒假作业。

sentences.english: Because i have a lot of housework.
sentences.chinese: 因为我有很多的寒假作业还没做完。

sentences.english: When I got up, she has already finished her handwriting task and school assignment.
sentences.chinese: 当我起来的时候，她已经完成了书法作业和暑假作业。

sentences.english: Jeff Van Gundy has insisted that Yao's summer workload has not limited his growth.
sentences.chinese: JVG坚持说姚明的暑假作业并没有限制他的成长。

sentences.english: The temple system of worship had degenerated to the point that it had become worse than a sham.
sentences.chinese: 礼拜制度堕落如斯，竟比假作虔诚更恶。

sentences.english: Although hit is summer vacation homework, but also do not have a flavor.
sentences.chinese: 虽然是写暑假作业，但也别有一番风味。

sentences.english: Because is a lie really a lie if it ought to have been true?
sentences.chinese: 然而，世间万物是否都能够假作真时真亦假呢？

sentences.english: A girl screams in mock fright.
sentences.chinese: 有个姑娘假作一声惊叫。

sentences.english: Completely lost in a make-believe world, I seemed to see all the lamplights drifting from the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一念至诚的将假作真，灯光似乎都从地上飘起。

sentences.english: Of course, I finish my summer exercises on time.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我也按时完成了暑假作业。

sentences.english: After doing his holiday homework for a while, he is playing a card game on the computer.
sentences.chinese: 做了一会他的寒假作业，他就到电脑上玩纸牌游戏。

sentences.english: I would also like to do my summer job.
sentences.chinese: 我还要做我的暑假作业。

sentences.english: I got up early and checked my wintcr vacation homework before going to sclool.
sentences.chinese: 我起得很早，上学前整理我的寒假作业。

sentences.english: She finished all her summer exercises yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，她已经做完了所有的暑假作业。

sentences.english: But children in China have to do the homework for Winter Holiday.
sentences.chinese: 但是在中国，孩子们还要做寒假作业。

definition: to put on an attitude/to pose
to have no alternative/to be helpless
